00132 #define MM_READ_ERR(buffer, size, count) \
00133     if (p3utils->anchor == NULL || (count = read (p3utils->anchor->fd, buffer, size)) < 0)
00134 
00148 #define MM_WRITE_ERR(buffer, size) \
00149     if (p3utils->anchor == NULL || write(p3utils->anchor->fd, buffer, size) < 0)
